text: <@U25PYL3Q8> if you need some help with that tree let me know

Thanks! I managed to get the fence rigged up last night. Tree tried to take off and it caused the fence to get pulled up, breaking a few of the 4x4s in the ground. Most of my work now is getting my house back to some kind of normalcy, but I have 4-8 people sleeping here without power, so I'm pretty much fighting a losing battle
